Package ui.drawing

Interface Section

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BufferedSection, MenuItem, OrderedSectionComposer<T>, ResponsiveSection, SectionComposer<T>, SelectableBufferedSection, SelectableResponsiveSection, SelectableSection
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AIPlayerConfig, BasicSectionComposer, BasicSectionGrid, BorderSection, BufferedSectionComposer, BufferedSectionGrid, Button, CentredSection, ChangeViewButton, ClientPlayerConfig, ColouredChar, ColouredString, Dialog, DrawableBufferedSection, DrawableResponsiveSection, DrawableSection, DrawableSelectableBufferedSection, DrawableSelectableSection, ExitButton, ExitButton, Filler, Game, Game.ExitToMenuButton, Game.GameFinishedDialog, Game.PauseButton, Game.PauseMenu, Game.PauseMenuResumeButton, GameBoard, GameBoard.PromotionIndicator, GameMenu, GameStartButton, Hand, Hand.BorderedPiece, HumanPlayerConfig, LabeledMenuItem, Menu, MenuButton, MenuString, MinimumSize, MinimumSize.MinimumSizeDialog, MinimumSize.MinimumSizeDialog.Dialog, MinimumSize.MinimumSizeDialog.TooSmallMessage, MinimumSizeSection, NoOverlapSectionComposer, OnlinePlayerConfig.PortBox, OptionChooser, Piece, Player.ConfigButton, PlayerConfig, PlayerConfig.NamedPlayerConfig, ResponsiveBorderSection, SectionGrid, SelectableBorderedSection, SelectableBufferedGrid, SelectableCentredSection, SelectableGrid, SelectableMinimumSizeSection, SelectableResponsiveBorderedSection, ServerPlayerConfig, SocketPlayer.ServerPlayer.ConnectingMessage, TextBox, UnselectableBufferedSection, UnselectableResponsiveSection, UnselectableSection, WrappingColouredString
    public interface Section
    Defines something that can be drawn to the terminal. Has a width and height and a method that draws a specified row to a ColouredStringBuilder.

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      static ColouredChar FILLER  
      static char FILLER_CHAR

      Generates a single line of the section to be written to the terminal.

    • Field Detail

      • FILLER_CHAR

        static final char FILLER_CHAR
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FILLER

        static final ColouredChar FILLER

    • Method Detail

      • getRow

        void getRow​(ColouredStringBuilder builder,
            int row,
            int startCol,
            int maxCols)
        Generates a single line of the section to be written to the terminal.
        Parameters:
        builder - ColouredStringBuilder to handle ANSI colour coding in the most efficient manner.
        row - Which row of the section to generate.
        startCol - The column of the section to start at.
        maxCols - The max number of columns to draw.

      • getRows

        int getRows()
        Getter for number of rows.
        Returns:
        The height of the section in characters.

      • getColumns

        int getColumns()
        Getter for number of columns.
        Returns:
        The width of the section in characters.

      • update

        void update()
        Called before drawing the section.
